New Records: Australia and Travis Head set a world record T20 international powerplay score with 113 in 6 overs.
Key Match Events: Mitch Marsh and Travis Head scored 113 in the powerplay
Jake Fraser-McGurk was dismissed for a duck
Mark Watt bowled Xavier Bartlett, hitting the stumps
George Munsey cleared the ropes three times for Scotland
Adam Zampa and Riley Meredith delivered their full complement of wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Travis Head commented on the team's start to the series
Mitch Marsh highlighted the overall team performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia won the match by seven wickets in 9.4 overs
Australia's pace bowlers adapted to conditions quickly
Xavier Bartlett was the pick with 2-23 from his four overs
